text: This is a list of Avid DNxHD resolutions, mainly available in multiple HD encoding resolutions based on the frame size and frame rate of the media being encoded. The list below shows the available encoding choices for each of the available frame size and frame rate combinations.DNxHD White Paper Its sister codec, Avid DNxHR, supports resolutions beyond FullHD. ==1080== ===1080p60=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
